title: Rioters! Make a Loyal Fan happy, 1000th win coming up
body:
Rioters any and all, I am very near my 1000th normal win (I don't include dominion! ), and would love if one of yall would accept a friend invite, and then play with me on that 1000th win.


Thanks in Advance!

 - Thee Schlong Connery

replies.body: lol, I'm well past that (almost 3x) and have yet to get one to respond. Best of luck :)
I won my 1000th game 2 years ago, and its been glitched at 600 ever since
Im Sorry :( I love to track my progress, I just want a milestone with a Rioter :)
